resources.string: That was a really ugly storm. Worst I've seen.
See, it would be nice if I could offer you a cup of mead, and say, 'welcome to Aeternum!'\n\nBut this isn't really a welcoming party.
The Everfall settlement is not too far.\n\nYou'll want to head up there soon, but I hope you'll stick around a bit longer, perhaps help me deal with this mess.
There's definitely still remnants of Corruption about, and that is really... not good.
If the source of the Corruption is cleansed, the hard part of our work here is done.
It's funny. I've seen many people crawl out of the sea here, but you're different. \n\nSpecial even. See you again soon, I hope.
Thank you for visiting, but now's not a good time. Be careful when you go -don't slip on that loose board out there!
I'd call a town meeting, but I worry my misfortune is contagious.\n\nWe need an expert on this Corruption business… and someone to boost defenses. It's… overwhelming.
I should just stay here and mind my own business.\n\nIt's safer for everyone that way.
From now on, anytime you like, visit me or the Town Board. \n\nYou can take any tasks that suit your fancy.
This Corruption business gets thicker and more ominous by the minute.\n\nPeople have been reporting gobs of that crimson evil popping up everywhere, closer and closer to the setttlement.
I hope that crazy old man knows something that can turn the tide around here.\n\nIf not, we'll all be walking around, red eyes and raving lunatics before you know it.
Ah, look what the mangy old cat dragged in!\n\nCecilia says you helped her make me this lucky charm. That was very kind of you.
I'll tell Magistrate Clark he doesn't have to bear all the burden any more. \n\nI'm ready and willing to do my part.
Welcome to Everfall! A finer and safer place you will not find in all of Aeternum!
We must make preparations to secure the settlement.\n\nThe Corruption will come - it's just a question of when.
If you intend to enlist with another settlement, now is the time.\n\nWe can certainly use your sword-arm around here, however.
Back in the Old World, I knew for certain that a score of valiant soldiers could defend against any threat. \n\nThose days are gone.
You've undoubtedly seen the factions in town - the Marauders, the Syndicate, and the Covenant.\n\nLike or not, they are best equipped to defend Everfall.
Despite the general mood around town, I have a good feeling about things.
Surely you've noticed the Towers of the Ancients in our territory.\n\nI've often wondered what secrets they might contain.
The Corruption is most undoubtedly spreading across Aeternum right now. \n\nWe must find a way to keep it outside our walls.
If you want to engage in idle chit-chat, I suggest you visit the barkeep.
I understand you've been working with Maecia.\n\nShe is a… unique leader, is she not?
You can take that blade, or anything else you forge to the trading post.\n\nThe Magistrate will make purchases for the arsenal.
Survivalist Lee, or 'Fancypants,' as I call him, is an egotistical brute.\n\nAnd I find his fashion sense wanting.
Unfortunately, it's difficult to get any work done around that nettlesome Survivalist. \n\nI suggest you avoid him at all cost.
Have you spoken to Survivalist Lee? He hasn't said a word to me in some time.
You know, I never would have guessed it, but my brooch matches Odnell's pants quite well, I think.
Storms buffeting the shores, the shattered mountain spewing Corruption, and breaches opening up in our own backyard!\n\nExciting times, my friend!
Question for you is, what'll you do if this all comes crashing down?\n\nYou better know how to survive on your own.
You remind me that sometimes I need a break from settlement life. \n\nNothing like running through the woods with nothing but your pants on, you know?
Now here comes a proud warrior if ever I've seen one! \n\nIf you're looking to knock some skulls around, you've come to the right place!
I swear, I don't know what the woman has against me.\n\nAm I just too damn sexy for her because of the way I dress?
Now here comes a proud warrior if ever I've seen one! \n\nIf you're looking to knock some skulls around, you've come to the right place!
Sometimes good things happen only when you give up and stop forcing them to be that way.
Oh hello there! You are most welcome to the Everfall tavern. \n\nSit down, imbibe, take a moment to enjoy life.
Hello! Are you new in town? I think you must be.\n\nThat's good, you know. Fresh faces, confidence.
Can you believe it? Constable Maecia actually came down and drank an ale with me earlier. You and I - we made a difference!
Yes. I can see that you're new to Aeternum. Strong arms though - a warrior. \n\nProbably some heads for you to bop somewhere then. Good day!
I already know what Magistrate Clark hopes for - my help in defending against the Corruption.\n\nI just have to decide whether that interests me.
You know, we're capable of doing great things together. \n\nYour brawn, my brain. Nothing can stop us.
I've been waiting for you some time, you know. \n\nQuite a compliment, I should say.
This is truly groundbreaking work we're accomplishing here. \n\nStay at my side, and the power of the stars will soon be at our disposal.
It all makes sense now. The towers, the stars, the guardians.\n\nThe question is simply - what changed?
Now, if I can just figure out how to activate this sphere. It won't take long! Not for me!
Now, if I can just figure out how to activate this sphere. It won't take long! Not for me!
You've done so much for me and my research, friend. \n\nYou remind me of one of my former colleagues, Simon Grey. We had a bit of a rivalry, as you might imagine.

Based on the Foreman's Ledger you recovered, it's clear that the Amrine Excavation delved into an underground network of ruins that actually led to the Shattered Obelisk!\n\nI knew there was more to that place!
Together, we have uncovered more insights into the Ancients than anyone else in Aeternum history.\n\nHear that, Simon Grey? Oh sorry, that's disrespectful, isn't it? But who cares? I don't!

Hello. I’m with the Syndicate. We are the true inheritors of the legacy of The Ancients. We are committed to harnessing the power of Azoth and ushering in a new and never-ending age of enlightenment for all.
Are you here to seek knowledge?\n\nThen this is proof you have wisdom.
Observe the other Faction Leaders and you will come to understand that your path is with the Syndicate.
I see that inquisitive sparkle in your eye. It is the same with us all.\n\nKnowledge stands above all things - that is our code.
Strength untempered by reason leads to nothing but ruin. Alas, you will learn this soon enough.
You zealots see faith as a virtue. But what is faith if not belief without evidence? In other words, madness.
Now that you are one of us, you will have access to vast knowledge… in time. \n\nBut first, I have a challenge for you.
I greet you in reverence, fellow pursuer of knowledge.
We are the Covenant. We are charged by divine decree to protect this place and administer justice.\n\n I serve as the Adjudicator for this settlement.
I am here on behalf of the Covenant seeking those who are similarly inspired.
Learn of the other factions to understand their folly.\n\n Return to me to find salvation by joining the Covenant.
Do I see the spark of righteousness in this one?\n\nIn a world beset by darkness, we are the light.
Oh great Marauder, always in such a rush to act. Yet so blind to the suffering such methods beget.\n\nMay your Spark burn steadfastly, and illuminate a new truth in you.
So great must be the burden of knowing all the world's truths! \n\nHave you come to educate such a wretch as me?
We cannot stand by and watch others suffer. \n\nThat is why I must make one request of you.
The light of the Covenant shines within you.
You look strong, friend. You should consider joining the Marauders.\n\nWe will put that strength to use.
Who's brave enough to approach the Marauder Commander?
I challenge you to meet with the other Factions. \n\nThen you will understand that we Marauders are the strongest.
You look strong, friend. You should consider joining the Marauders.\n\nWe will put that strength to use.
And here we have a member of the Syndicate. \n\nI suggest you stay with your nose in those books. Leave the fighting to us.
Don't wait for me to genuflect, cultist.\n\nA Marauder bends the knee for no one.
A Marauder salivates at the prospect of battle. \n\nThis mission is not a test, but a reward.
I salute you, fellow Marauder. \n\nWe will never give up the fight, and in the end, we will emerge victorious.
Welcome to 'The Autumn Rest'! Always a colorful place to be.\n\nYou here to check in? Be my guest… literally!
You've become a real regular around here, haven't you? Hope this place is starting to feel like home.\n\nSay though, are you more of a townie? Or do you venture out into the great beyond?
Now that you caught a glimpse of Windsward, I trust you see why Everfall is a damn nice place.\n\nThe Autumn Rest is the place you can fall like a leaf into your bed anytime!
One of these days I'm going to take a vacation, maybe even go as far south as First Light.\n\nI've been squirreling away azoth and gold for years. I've earned a vacation, I think.
You know, I'm never one to turn away a good paying customer.\n\nBut you been here long enough - might want to look into buying a house, putting down roots.
Hi there! I'm Master Fisher Ruby! Are you new to fishing?
Hi there! I'm Master Fisher Ruby! Are you new to fishing?
I'm so proud of you out there fishing.
Did you see my cart? The wilds of Aeternum have never been safe, but the roads?\n\nNever seen anything like this before today! Vicious boars came out of nowhere - ate all my truffles!
Oh, I think we'll be seeing more of each other down the road a piece.\n\nYes, indeed. Always down the road a piece.
